categories: Category:Imperial Navy pilots of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Dodson Makraven, callsign "Night Beast", was a male human TIE fighter pilot who flew as part of Obsidian Squadron under the callsign of Obsidian Two. He earned the callsign "Night Beast" because of repeated curfew violations. At some point, he flew a TIE/ln space superiority starfighter near the Tibanna gas mining colony Cloud City.
